item.title: Caregiving tips for Alzheimer's disease
item.itunes:author: MayoClinic.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Caregiving tips for Alzheimer's disease
item.itunes:summary: Caring for someone who has Alzheimer's can be challenging. Learn how to make your caregiving more effective.
item.description: Caring for someone who has Alzheimer's can be challenging. Learn how to make your caregiving more effective.

item.title: Tips for slowing the decline of Alzheimer's
item.itunes:author: MayoClinic.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Tips for slowing the mental decline of Alzheimer's
item.itunes:summary: Keeping a daily journal or calendar can slow the mental decline of Alzheimer's. Get tips in this podcast with a Mayo Clinic expert.
item.description: Keeping a daily journal or calendar can slow the mental decline of Alzheimer's. Get tips in this podcast with a Mayo Clinic expert.
